name: 8-Bit Brawl
description:
Take part in this epic battle of robot destruction with 8-Bit Brawl!

Fight your opponent to the death, use your weapons, or push them out of the arena to reduce your enemy to a pile of scrap!

Controls: 

  • W = Move Forward
  • S = Move Backward
  • A = Turn Left
  • D = Turn Right
  • SPACE = Attack

Choose your bot to brawl with!

BOT DOG:

Destroy your foe using the almighty destructive power of the hot dog!

SWEEPY

Force back your enemies with a devastating blow from the end of a broom!




This game does not constitute medical advice, and should not be relied upon as such

Ahoy! Here's the boring bit, but we'd appreciate you reading anyway. This game is totally free, and isn’t intended as a commercial product. We’d love it if you could toss a coin to your humble game merchants on your way through, but please consider your donation to us, not as payment for a product. This game might feature some elements from other media, or bear resemblance to real people or places. We always include such references in good faith, and purely for satirical or comedic purposes.
